thread.title: BRIEF-Herbalife Announces Self-Tender Offer Seeking To Purchase Up To $600 Million Of Its Common Shares

title: BRIEF-Herbalife Announces Self-Tender Offer Seeking To Purchase Up To $600 Million Of Its Common Shares
text:
35 PM / Updated 18 minutes ago BRIEF-Herbalife Announces Self-Tender Offer Seeking To Purchase Up To $600 Million Of Its Common Shares Reuters Staff 
April 18 (Reuters) - Herbalife Ltd: 
* HERBALIFE ANNOUNCES SELF-TENDER OFFER SEEKING TO PURCHASE UP TO $600 MILLION OF ITS COMMON SHARES 
* HERBALIFE LTD - TENDER OFFER IS SCHEDULED TO EXPIRE AT 5:00 P.M., NEW YORK CITY TIME, ON MAY 16, 2018 
* HERBALIFE - COMMENCED OFFER TO BUY IN CASH UP TO $600 MILLION OF SHARES OF COMMON STOCK AT PER SHARE PRICE NOT GREATER THAN $108.00 NOR LESS THAN $98.00 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
